Overwhelming immune inflammatory response ‐ More severe forms of COVID‐19 disease are characterized by an acute systemic inflammatory response and cytokine storm, leading to multiple organ dysfunction syndrome (MODS). Several studies have documented high circulating levels of proinflammatory cytokines in patients with severe/critical COVID‐19 disease.
